titleStmt.title: A short discourse between monarchical and aristocratical government. Or a sober perswasive of all true-hearted Englishmen, to a willing conjunction with the Parliament of England in setting up the government of a common-wealth. By a true Englishman, and well-wisher to the good of this nation.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, Henry, 1605?-1664?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock for Francis Tyton, and are to be sold at his shop at the three Daggers neer the Inner-Temple, Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the three Daggers neer the Inner-Temple
